item.title: Shiny Application: Use of Cluster Anlysis to Detect Multiple Enrollments in Clinical Trials
item.description: Abstract Multiple enrollment refers to a practice of a patient taking part in a clinical trial at more than two sites within same study or in multiple studies within same clinical program. Patients seek multiple enrollments for a variety of reasons. Some seek more access to the study drugs while others are seeking additional compensations. Whatever reasons, multiple enrollments by a single patient at different sites in a study or across studies compromises the data integrity and jeopardizes the patientâ€™s safety.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
